entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this morning then clearing. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:14 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 08:14 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
